landing.title: Generate Mock GitHub
landing.subtitle: Contributions
landing.description: Create realistic GitHub contribution graphs with natural patterns. Perfect for testing, demonstrations, or just for fun.

customDateRange.title: Custom Date Range
customDateRange.description: Select any date range to generate your contribution graph

realisticPatterns.title: Realistic Patterns
realisticPatterns.description: Natural commit distribution with configurable ranges

privacyFirst.title: Privacy First
privacyFirst.description: All data stays in your browser - nothing is sent to servers

landing.generateFirstGraph: Generate your first contribution graph in seconds

generator.title: Contribution Generator
generator.description: Create realistic GitHub contribution patterns with natural distribution

selectDate.title: Select a Date
selectDate.description: Click on any cell in contribution graph to view detailed commit information

noCommits.title: No Commits
noCommits.description: There are no commits on this date

generationMode.title: Mode

conservative.title: Conservative
conservative.description: Only generate commits on dates with no existing contributions. Avoids stacking.

normal.title: Normal
normal.description: Generate commits regardless of existing contributions. May stack with your current activity.

aggressive.title: Aggressive
aggressive.description: Generate commits on all dates regardless. Maximizes contribution activity.

generationMode.note: Note: Your GitHub Profile counts commits from all public repositories. If you have existing commits on a date, they will be added together.

gitConfig.title: Git Configuration
gitConfig.githubUrlHelp: Leave empty to create local repository only

alerts.startDateError: Start date must be before end date
alerts.minMaxError: Min commits must be less than or equal to max commits

footer.builtWith: Built with Next.js, React, and Tailwind CSS
